name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, devoted to optimizing **Java** applications and enhancing **JVM** performance. Extensive expertise in **distributed systems**, focusing on **concurrency** and **performance engineering** to deliver scalable solutions. Proven skills in **memory management** and **garbage collection**, ensuring optimal application performance. Proficient in implementing **observability tools**, **caching**, and **indexing** strategies to improve **I/O behavior** in multi-threaded environments.

Additionally, a Full Stack Developer with strong capabilities in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Experienced in cloud deployments using **AWS** and **Azure**, and in constructing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Committed to compliance and best practices, aligning with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Background in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

- Led architectural discussions focused on garbage collection strategies, enhancing the sustainability of resource management within the JVM environment.

Leveraged existing tech stack including **Node.js** (NestJS/Express), **Python** (FastAPI, Django), **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **TypeScript** to ensure collaborative integration across diverse programming environments while maintaining Java-based architecture.
